We can’t stop the Honey Corps!\""},{"lineNumber":49771,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちっ……！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch...!\""},{"lineNumber":49772,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんなんだ、あの大量のハニーは……！","translatedEnglishLine":"What the hell is with that huge number of Honeys...!\""},{"lineNumber":49773,"originalJapaneseLine":"　仕方ないな、戦線を下げて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Can't be helped, we’ll have to pull back the front lines...\""},{"lineNumber":49774,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ダメだ、下げるな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, don’t pull back."},{"lineNumber":49775,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今下げれば負けるぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"If we retreat now, we’ll lose.\""},{"lineNumber":49776,"originalJapaneseLine":"「っと、毛利の……そうは言うがな、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, Mouri... I know what you’re saying, but—"},{"lineNumber":49777,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こっちじゃ打てる手が少なすぎる」","translatedEnglishLine":"We have too few options on this side.\""},{"lineNumber":49778,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ハニーなら毛利で叩く。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If it’s the Honeys, Mouri will strike them."},{"lineNumber":49779,"originalJapaneseLine":"　瀬戸物割りは手下どものいい遊びだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Breaking pottery is just a fun game for the lackeys.\""},{"lineNumber":49780,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔軍連中はこっちでやれってかい？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So you want us to deal with the demon army over here?"},{"lineNumber":49781,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それはそれでハードな申し出だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"That’s still a pretty tough proposition.\""},{"lineNumber":49782,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だがそれしかあるまい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But there’s no other choice."},{"lineNumber":49783,"originalJapaneseLine":"　儂が前線に出る。指揮は任せた」","translatedEnglishLine":"I will go to the front line. I leave the command to you.\""},{"lineNumber":49784,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………はい、わかりました。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Yes, understood."},{"lineNumber":49785,"originalJapaneseLine":"　雷軍、光軍、お借りします」","translatedEnglishLine":"I’ll be borrowing the Thunder Army and the Light Army.\""},{"lineNumber":49786,"originalJapaneseLine":"「予定より少しタイミングが早いですが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The timing is a bit earlier than planned, but..."},{"lineNumber":49787,"originalJapaneseLine":"　仕方ありませんね。わかりました」","translatedEnglishLine":"It can’t be helped. Understood.\""},{"lineNumber":49788,"originalJapaneseLine":"「出撃する！　巻き添えを食うなよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We’re launching! Don’t get caught in the crossfire!\""},{"lineNumber":49789,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、おおおおぉぉっ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"O-Ohhhhhh!\""},{"lineNumber":49790,"originalJapaneseLine":"　雷帝様が出られるぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"The Thunder Emperor-sama is coming out!\""},{"lineNumber":49791,"originalJapaneseLine":"「行くぞ者ども！　瀬戸物割りだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Let’s go, everyone! Time to break some pottery!\""},{"lineNumber":49792,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔軍とハニワを分断するぜ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We’ll cut off the demon army and the Honey Corps!"},{"lineNumber":49793,"originalJapaneseLine":"　奴らを合流させるな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don’t let them unite!\""},{"lineNumber":49794,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ヒャッハァァァァァァァァ！！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hyaaaaaaaaaaa!!\""},{"lineNumber":49795,"originalJapaneseLine":"　割りまくるぜぇぇぇぇぇぇぇ！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"We’ll smash everything!!\""},{"lineNumber":49796,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おー、やってるやってる。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, they’re doing it, they’re doing it."},{"lineNumber":49797,"originalJapaneseLine":"　よし、いくぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, here we go.\""},{"lineNumber":49798,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔軍さんと、ハニーさんたちが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The demon army and the Honeys..."},{"lineNumber":49799,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうしますか、ランス様」","translatedEnglishLine":"What will you do, Rance-sama?\""},{"lineNumber":49800,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もちろん、狙いは魔軍だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Of course, the target is the demon army."},{"lineNumber":49801,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔物将軍を狙うぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"We’ll aim for the demon generals.\""},{"lineNumber":49802,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、そうですよね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, that’s right."},{"lineNumber":49803,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やっぱり敵のリーダーさんを……」","translatedEnglishLine":"We should definitely go for the enemy’s leader...\""},{"lineNumber":49804,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ハニーなんぞ、割ってもGOLDくらいしか出てこん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Breaking Honeys only yields about GOLD."},{"lineNumber":49805,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔物将軍を叩き割れば……うひひひ」","translatedEnglishLine":"But smash a demon general... uhihihi.\""},{"lineNumber":49806,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ……女の子が……ですか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... are they girls...?\""},{"lineNumber":49807,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははははは、そういう訳でとつげーき！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahaha! That’s why, charge!"},{"lineNumber":49808,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔軍の連中をぶちのめすぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"We’re gonna smash those demon army guys!\""},{"lineNumber":49809,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………ん？　なんだありゃ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hm? What is that?\""},{"lineNumber":49810,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっほ、えっほ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh-ho, eh-ho.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では……どうされますか、ランス様。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then... what will you do, Rance-sama?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザさんからの連絡が来るまで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Until we receive word from Urza-san..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔物をぶち殺す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'll slaughter the monsters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっとでも数を減らしておくぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll reduce their numbers, even if just a little."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、は、はい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-yes!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （……いやに勤勉ね）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (...He's surprisingly diligent.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ウルザさんが、心配……なんだと思います。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (I think he’s worried about Urza-san...
That’s why...)"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい、マジック。今、敵が多いのはどこだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, Magic. Where are the enemies concentrated right now?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えっ！？　あ、うん！　えと、それなら……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eh!? Ah, yeah! Well then..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スリミドから南西、サンデー平原――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To the southwest from Surimido, the Sunday Plains——

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――戦場は、混迷を極めていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —The battlefield was in utter chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サンデー平原を巡るゼス軍と魔軍の戦いは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle between the Zeth army and the demon army over the Sunday Plains

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最大の激しさでもって繰り返されていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was being fought repeatedly with the greatest ferocity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大規模な会戦に及ぶ事、既に三度。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There had already been three large scale battles.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数十万の魔軍に対し、ゼスも四軍全ての主力、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Against hundreds of thousands of demon troops, Zeth had deployed all the main forces of his four armies,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてアレックスを除く三将軍全員を投入する事で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and all three generals except Alex had been sent out to counter them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 対抗していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They had been opposing them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし――――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However——

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ダメです！　ハニー軍団、止めきれません！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's no use! We can’t stop the Honey Corps!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんなんだ、あの大量のハニーは……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What the hell is with that huge number of Honeys...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仕方ないな、戦線を下げて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Can't be helped, we’ll have to pull back the front lines..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ダメだ、下げるな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, don’t pull back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今下げれば負けるぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we retreat now, we’ll lose."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「っと、毛利の……そうは言うがな、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, Mouri... I know what you’re saying, but—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こっちじゃ打てる手が少なすぎる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have too few options on this side."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハニーなら毛利で叩く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If it’s the Honeys, Mouri will strike them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 瀬戸物割りは手下どものいい遊びだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Breaking pottery is just a fun game for the lackeys."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔軍連中はこっちでやれってかい？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So you want us to deal with the demon army over here?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはそれでハードな申し出だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s still a pretty tough proposition."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だがそれしかあるまい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But there’s no other choice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂が前線に出る。指揮は任せた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will go to the front line. I leave the command to you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………はい、わかりました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Yes, understood.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雷軍、光軍、お借りします」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll be borrowing the Thunder Army and the Light Army."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「予定より少しタイミングが早いですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The timing is a bit earlier than planned, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仕方ありませんね。わかりました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It can’t be helped. Understood."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「出撃する！　巻き添えを食うなよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We’re launching! Don’t get caught in the crossfire!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おおおおぉぉっ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "O-Ohhhhhh!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雷帝様が出られるぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Thunder Emperor-sama is coming out!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「行くぞ者ども！　瀬戸物割りだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Let’s go, everyone! Time to break some pottery!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔軍とハニワを分断するぜ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We’ll cut off the demon army and the Honey Corps!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴らを合流させるな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don’t let them unite!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ヒャッハァァァァァァァァ！！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hyaaaaaaaaaaa!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 割りまくるぜぇぇぇぇぇぇぇ！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’ll smash everything!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おー、やってるやってる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, they’re doing it, they’re doing it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、いくぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, here we go."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔軍さんと、ハニーさんたちが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The demon army and the Honeys...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしますか、ランス様」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What will you do, Rance-sama?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もちろん、狙いは魔軍だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course, the target is the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍を狙うぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’ll aim for the demon generals."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、そうですよね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, that’s right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっぱり敵のリーダーさんを……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We should definitely go for the enemy’s leader..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハニーなんぞ、割ってもGOLDくらいしか出てこん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Breaking Honeys only yields about GOLD.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍を叩き割れば……うひひひ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But smash a demon general... uhihihi."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ……女の子が……ですか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... are they girls...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははははは、そういう訳でとつげーき！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahaha! That’s why, charge!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の連中をぶちのめすぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’re gonna smash those demon army guys!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………ん？　なんだありゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Hm? What is that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えっほ、えっほ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eh-ho, eh-ho."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

What is that?\""},{"lineNumber":49810,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっほ、えっほ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh-ho, eh-ho.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では……どうされますか、ランス様。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then... what will you do, Rance-sama?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザさんからの連絡が来るまで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Until we receive word from Urza-san..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔物をぶち殺す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'll slaughter the monsters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっとでも数を減らしておくぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll reduce their numbers, even if just a little."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、は、はい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-yes!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （……いやに勤勉ね）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (...He's surprisingly diligent.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ウルザさんが、心配……なんだと思います。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (I think he’s worried about Urza-san...
That’s why...)"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい、マジック。今、敵が多いのはどこだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, Magic. Where are the enemies concentrated right now?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えっ！？　あ、うん！　えと、それなら……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eh!? Ah, yeah! Well then..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スリミドから南西、サンデー平原――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To the southwest from Surimido, the Sunday Plains——

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――戦場は、混迷を極めていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —The battlefield was in utter chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サンデー平原を巡るゼス軍と魔軍の戦いは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle between the Zeth army and the demon army over the Sunday Plains

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最大の激しさでもって繰り返されていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was being fought repeatedly with the greatest ferocity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大規模な会戦に及ぶ事、既に三度。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There had already been three large scale battles.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数十万の魔軍に対し、ゼスも四軍全ての主力、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Against hundreds of thousands of demon troops, Zeth had deployed all the main forces of his four armies,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてアレックスを除く三将軍全員を投入する事で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and all three generals except Alex had been sent out to counter them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 対抗していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They had been opposing them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし――――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However——

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ダメです！　ハニー軍団、止めきれません！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's no use! We can’t stop the Honey Corps!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんなんだ、あの大量のハニーは……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What the hell is with that huge number of Honeys...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仕方ないな、戦線を下げて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Can't be helped, we’ll have to pull back the front lines..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ダメだ、下げるな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, don’t pull back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今下げれば負けるぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we retreat now, we’ll lose."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「っと、毛利の……そうは言うがな、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, Mouri... I know what you’re saying, but—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こっちじゃ打てる手が少なすぎる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have too few options on this side."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハニーなら毛利で叩く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If it’s the Honeys, Mouri will strike them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 瀬戸物割りは手下どものいい遊びだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Breaking pottery is just a fun game for the lackeys."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔軍連中はこっちでやれってかい？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So you want us to deal with the demon army over here?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはそれでハードな申し出だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s still a pretty tough proposition."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だがそれしかあるまい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But there’s no other choice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂が前線に出る。指揮は任せた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will go to the front line. I leave the command to you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………はい、わかりました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Yes, understood.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雷軍、光軍、お借りします」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll be borrowing the Thunder Army and the Light Army."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「予定より少しタイミングが早いですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The timing is a bit earlier than planned, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仕方ありませんね。わかりました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It can’t be helped. Understood."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「出撃する！　巻き添えを食うなよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We’re launching! Don’t get caught in the crossfire!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おおおおぉぉっ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "O-Ohhhhhh!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雷帝様が出られるぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Thunder Emperor-sama is coming out!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「行くぞ者ども！　瀬戸物割りだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Let’s go, everyone! Time to break some pottery!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔軍とハニワを分断するぜ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We’ll cut off the demon army and the Honey Corps!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴らを合流させるな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don’t let them unite!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ヒャッハァァァァァァァァ！！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hyaaaaaaaaaaa!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 割りまくるぜぇぇぇぇぇぇぇ！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’ll smash everything!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おー、やってるやってる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, they’re doing it, they’re doing it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、いくぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, here we go."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔軍さんと、ハニーさんたちが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The demon army and the Honeys...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしますか、ランス様」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What will you do, Rance-sama?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もちろん、狙いは魔軍だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course, the target is the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍を狙うぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’ll aim for the demon generals."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、そうですよね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, that’s right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっぱり敵のリーダーさんを……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We should definitely go for the enemy’s leader..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハニーなんぞ、割ってもGOLDくらいしか出てこん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Breaking Honeys only yields about GOLD.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍を叩き割れば……うひひひ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But smash a demon general... uhihihi."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ……女の子が……ですか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... are they girls...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははははは、そういう訳でとつげーき！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahaha! That’s why, charge!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の連中をぶちのめすぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’re gonna smash those demon army guys!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………ん？　なんだありゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Hm? What is that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えっほ、えっほ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eh-ho, eh-ho."
